text: Ezɨ amɨmzaraghan mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanim bar deragh foghasa, Pol arazir kurar manam gamizɨ, Judaba a mɨgei. Ezɨ a Polɨn senba fɨrigha, Godɨn ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan kotɨn aven itir gumaziba bar men diazɨ, me iza uari akufa. Ezɨ a Pol inigha ghuaghira men damazimɨn anetɨzɨ a tughav iti.
